docs.text: Viper, Professional Pilot "The sky is mine pilot. Nowhere to run, nowhere to hide" !(Viper-2.jpg) A member of the Notorious Apex Predators , Viper was a legendary IMC Titan pilot renouned for his extensive use of his fast hit and run tactics and thruster based titan mech usage. Viper's titan included: 1.Modified Northstar Chasis and Rail Gun 2.Enhanced thrusters capable of VTOL 3.Multiple rocket and auxillary missile systems
docs.title: Viper, Professional Pilot
